answers.answer: Try waiting 2 hours after your meals to check sugar. You give it time to rise & then fall/stabilize back to your normal levels. Are you experiencing any of the high blood sugar symptoms like nausea, dizziness, weakness, anxiety, sweats, chills? Like you've come down with a bad flu?

Hi, your fasting and post eating numbers reported are completely normal with your regular diet.When you ate high carb food (popcorn covered in caramel) you blood sugars did go a little higher than absolutely ideal, but not to a worrying level.What does this tell you?  it tells you that you should avoid / limit very sweet and high carb foods.Hope this helps.

question: I checked my blood sugar in past 2 daysand it was  81-85 fasting and around 99 after eating a meal ( vegetarian with no sugar added).Today i tried to eat Popcorn covered with a caramel.150 caloriesTotal Carohydrate 30gDietary Fiber 2gSugar 19gAnd in 10-15 minutes i checked my blood sugar again and it raised up to148But before same day readings was:After meal ( no sugar ) 94Fasting blood sugar at morning 81Is such raise normal or not?
title: Blood sugar after eating a food with sugar is it pre diabetes?
